long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Zoho CRM Extension. Higlight any text on any website and search it for leads, contacts, accounts or deals instantly within your Zoho CRM. Add leads to your Zoho CRM with a few clicks: no need to switch between tabs.
